flip_chart-teacher-facing-content-box.flip_chart-teacher-facing-paragraph: Families come in all different sizes. A family can have two people, or it can have many more! But all families have lots in common. People in a family help each other. They take care of each other. People in a family share fun. They share responsibilities, too. Most of all, people in a family love each other. Let’s look at some different families.
This mother is reading to a brother and sister. They are all enjoying the story! Does your family share books together? How else do you share quiet times?
These grandparents are in the park with their grandchild. Children and grandparents share special times and may go to special places. This picture also shows another family member, a pet!
This father is teaching two brothers to play soccer. It is a fun game! What does your family play together?
This girl is visiting her cousin and her aunt and uncle. They are having a picnic. What special activities can you do with your aunts and uncles and cousins?
These two sisters are playing a board game with their parents. It doesn’t matter who wins! It’s nice to play it together. What activities do you enjoy with your whole family?
